verses.text: \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, who shall abide in thy tabernacle? who shall dwell in thy holy hill?+ 15.1 abide: Heb. sojourn*
He that walketh uprightly, and worketh righteousness, and speaketh the truth in his heart.
He that* backbiteth not with his tongue, nor doeth evil to his neighbour, nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour.+ 15.3 takethâ€¦: or, receiveth, or, endureth*
In whose eyes a vile person is contemned; but he honoureth them that fear the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**. He that* sweareth to his own* hurt, and changeth not.
He that* putteth not out his money to usury, nor taketh reward against the innocent. He that doeth these things* shall never be moved.
